doc.after: The numerous gods of the ancient Greek religion as well as the mythical heroes and events of the ancient Greek epics The Odyssey and The Iliad and other pieces of art and literature from the time make up what is nowadays colloquially referred to as Greek mythology Apart from serving a religious function the mythology of the ancient Greek world also served a cosmological role as it was meant to try to explain how the world was formed and operated
